title: fps 79 and ms 24 but 1/2 second lag
body: i was playing a ranked today and out of nowhere even though ms and ping stayed stead 24 and 79 respectively i was lagging for up to a 1/2 second almost the entire match. it was impossible to dodge or land skill-shots and it cost me a ranked loss. (not saying i would have won for sure but it definitely didn't help)

replies.body: I had that problem too, turns out it was my internet and for some reason it wasn't transmitting on league.
It's packetless so it's your internet, ever since a recent patch it doesn't show it with your ping ingame

its packet loss.

No way to really fix it other than see what is going on with your internet.
ok thanks. its been really good for months which is why i was so confused but if it acts up again ill look into my isp
I have had this same problem, a very noticeable lag without seeing my ms go above 52.
